title: Avatar  Extended Collectors Edition 2009 DVDR AC3 5.1
description:
In the epic action adventure AVATAR and James Cameron, director of Titanic, takes us to a spectacular world beyond our imagination. In the distant moon Pandora, a reluctant hero embarks on a journey of redemption and discovery, leading a heroic battle to save a civilization. The film was conceived by Cameron 14 years ago, when there were no means to realize their ideas. Now, after four years of actual production work, AVATAR gives us an innovative total immersion experience in the cinema, where the revolutionary technology invented to make the film dissolves in the emotion of the characters and sweeping story.
